relation: Categories
Campus Safety
Greek Life
Clubs and Activities
Great for these types of students
Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus
Bang for the buck
What to do for fun
Food and Dining
Dorm Life
Academic Rigor
Tips for prospective students
In three sentences
Comments
I have not heard of any type of incident at all in the past.
I have not had any exposure to 'Greek' life as it is referenced.
Having only attended one club meeting I can only comment that it was fun and informative.
If you are working or have a family to tend to then you cannot go wrong with the flexible schedules and accommodating staff.
I have not come across any unusual traditions as of yet.
Being only three quarters in I must say that I am already being presented with opportunities that I would not have been given otherwise.
Apart from academia there are a number of clubs you can join to further your experience.
There is a small snack area with vending machines.
There are no dorms.
The classes are not intended to be too grueling as many students also have work and home lives to attend to. If you read the material and do the work it should be no problem.
There is no need for going overboard on school supplies, books and lab equipment are provided for you. Pen, pencil, and paper is all you need.
A friendly, competent staff with real world experience as well as a top notch learning facility complete with labs and computer banks that will propel students forward.
pageTitle: ITT Technical Institute Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {1018656=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 747805=Since i started ITT Technical Institute-Torrance in June 2012, i am amazed by how fast i am understanding and learning new programs such as Auto CAD and Inventor since my career choice is drafting and design. Usually i hear colleges have huge classes and also say that because of the the amount of students in a class, teachers cant help everyone when needed, but here in ITT Technical, the classes are small and the teachers are willing to help with any question needed. Importantly ITT Technical Institute has been a great help with my financial stuff by making sure that i'm at the right track from any financial problem., 991959=The location is 1905 S. Haggerty Road, Canton, MI 48185. It's not unusual, it's a quiet, pleasant, safe area, and very easy to find (across from 275 bridge near a CVS store), 320162=I think this is a great college for me to attend, to further my education. When I went and toured the campus is really liked how they work mostly hands on. I am really excited about attending this college in August., 684578=Students are allowed to correspond and perform orientation ceremonies for prospective students who are still in high school. For instance, I was the Student Ambassador for the School of Criminal Justice at the Mobile, AL campus from 2008 to 2010., 806703=You get out of it what you put into it. Study and be prepared for the assignments, and it will pay off. Answer questions properly and be meticulous in grammar and formatting. Do quality research online and in the library (ours is virtual)., 670799=I have not yet attended the school, because I start on the 12th of December. However during my enrollment and orientation I felt very welcomed and supported with the staff., 452513=Really cant rate this fairly considering I have do not start classes until september., 388974=Our campus is very safe, we've never had a problem there since i'v ebeen a student as of May 2011 and i've never heard nor seen anything happen. Where my campus is the police department is too far around the corner so they're constantly passing by. And on occasions they come by to talk to the students majoring in criminal justice., 146651=have not started yet i start on the 12th of march 2012, 153830=i have currently enrolled to and will begin attending itt technical institute on 03/19/2012. so far from what i have seen as far as a tour of the campus i believe this college will definitely offer me with the resources necessary to achieve my future goal. i am looking forward to attending this nationally recognized institute this spring., 735328=I have attended this campus since September 2011, there has never been a safety issue that I am aware of, however there are many veterans and faculty that attend this campus.}

textAfterTable: Categories Comments Great for these types of students ppl who are serious about getting their degree. It is too expensive to play or flunk out of. Tips for prospective students be very involved with your adviser. Do not be afraid of him/her, I can tell you first hand that they will do everything for you. AND do not plan on missing any classes. if u miss 1 day u have missed 10% of your semester. Bang for the buck yes we get the hands on experience, and everyone and I mean EVERYONE genuinely seems to enjoy being here, but I mean the price seems a bit ridiculous!! It just seems so overpriced, the community colleges charge so much less BUT community colleges have a VERY high drop out rate. ITT TECH does have a VERY good computer school. you WILL learn a lot. Am enjoying being here the atmosphere is friendly and warm, it is a nice environment not alot of people being disrespectful, I think because the teachers keep the students evolved and interested there is more respect,instead of people cutting up in class. Am learning a lot
